s_synopsis: "WWF SuperStars" is an arcade game based on the world of the World Wrestling Federation (WWF) from the 80s. The game solely plays the Tag-Team element of WWF and allows you to choose from the biggest stars of the time, Hulk Hogan, Ultimate Warrior, Big Boss Man, Macho Man Randy Savage, Honky Tonk Man and Hacksaw Jim Duggan. The aim of the game is that you and your partner win three matches before facing Ted DiBiase and André the Giant to become Tag-Team Champions.
